metadata.title: Dahlia Women's Summer Sun Hat - Classic Ribbon Bow Floppy Straw Hat
features: Circumference: 24 inches, Brim: 5 inches, Height: 4 inches
Stylish floppy straw hat with silver edged black ribbon bow
This elegant hat is great for keep the sun off your face and great for any occasions
Available in 2 Colors: Black White Stripes and Black brim
Risk-Free Shopping: quality assurance in addition to a no-question-asked return policy
description: With a classic look that never goes out of style, this Classic Ribbon Bow Floppy Hat is perfect for any women spending time outdoors. The crown circumference is 24 inches and 4 inches deep. The 5 inches wide floppy brim allows you to create versatile looks. It is one size fits most and is made of high quality straw. The casual shape makes it perfect for traveling and sightseeing, matching your cute summer sundress for outdoor picnic or shopping at the local farmer's market, and a great accessory with colorful swimsuit for a relaxing afternoon around beach or swimming pool.

Dahlia has served as the production company for many big brands over 20 years. With highly competitive pricing, superior quality and outstanding customer service, Dahlia has been regarded as one of the highest customer-rated merchants among thousands of sellers at Amazon.com since 2005. Besides our 30 days Return Policy, Dahlia offers quality assurance to ensure your risk free shopping experience. If there is anything issues please contact us directly. Your feedback and suggestions will help us make better products and provide better service.
